text: Erigeron multifolius is a Chinese species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It grows on rocky slopes, and forest margins at high elevations in Tibet and Yunnan in southwestern China. Erigeron multifolius is a perennial herb up to 25 cm (10 inches) tall, forming a thick underground rhizomes. Its flower heads have white, pale pink, or pale purple ray florets surrounding yellow disc florets.Flora of China, Erigeron multifolius Handel-Mazzetti, 1937. 密叶飞蓬 mi ye fei peng ==References== multifolius Category:Flora of China Category:Plants described in 1937
